recipesJson.name: Morning Moo Juice  (You can find the recipe pack at Bull City Flavors)
recipesJson.author: Juicefairy
recipesJson.description:
A classic breakfast smoothie with a very nice milky note and vibrant combination of orange banana and strawberry. You can find the recipe pack at Bull City Flavors. Sweeten to taste I normally add around 0.25% FW sweetener. 
(I have also used OSDIY Strawberry Milk in place of LB Strawberry cheesecake for a milkier mix with less buttery notes)

pageContext.name: Morning Moo Juice  (You can find the recipe pack at Bull City Flavors)
